General.Name: Aerodrome Group Ltd
General.Description: Aerodrome Group Ltd operates as a digital performance marketing company. It creates digital campaigns; and develops platforms, distribution methods, and monetization tools for brands in the mobile and digital markets. The company operates multi-channel RTB ad network for mobile and Web and app distribution network; provides Kibo, a branded keyboard for Android and iOS; and offers performance-based social campaign management services. It also provides digital monetization services for mobile and Web brands; and operates Totalik, a video distribution service. The company was formerly known as Apply Advanced Mobile Technologies Ltd. The company is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
